climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Aluminum Alloy Frame Mirror Full Length-Newly Upgraded Nano Glass

FULL SIZE: The standing mirror is 59" in length and 16" in width, large enough for you to see your entire figure in a single glance. This is not only a body mirror, but also a piece of art in your house that can bring you a nice mood every day.

ALUMINUM ALLOY FRAME: The wall mirror full length is surrounded by anti-rust and colorfast aluminum alloy. The very thin frame (only 0.23" wide on the front), is durable and has a shiny appearance. Wire drawing treat, more stylish and textured.

UPGRADED NANO GLASS: Our long mirror is made of durable 3 mm high-definition nano glass. Upgrade explosion-proof nano glass with pure silver layer is more high definition and not easy to break. Even if it is accidentally damaged by an external force, the broken pieces of the mirror will not splash in all directions.

ALL-MATCH: No Assembly Required. The floor length mirror can stand anywhere with the standing holder. You also can lean it against a wall, or you can hang it horizontally or vertically on the wall for space-saving. It is suitable for a bedroom, living room, cloakroom, home gym, corridor, clothing shop, etc.

100% REFUND/REPLACEMENT: Our mirror packaging fully passes the international drop test. In the unlikely event that a product arrives damaged, please feel free to contact us. A full refund or free replacement of mirror(s) damaged on arrival, no return required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant look yet Heavy-duty quality
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is amazing quality. Heavy in weight, precise with the mounting holes at the back and the metal corners met perfectly for a high quality look at a great price point!! I purchased 2 to place above my bedside dressers (behind my table lamps). The slim frame gives it an elegant look that's subtle and brings height to my bedroom. Not to mention reflects more light. Although there is a metal stand to prop it up, as a free standing mirror, disassemble was easy and the mirror lays flat up against the wall when mounted. I was afraid that (because of the length) it may warp or bow. But the heavy metal keeps it completely flat. And there is little to no gap between the mirror and wall.The packaging was super secure and had no damages during delivery. Not too heavy. I will definitely consider purchasing again for other decor projects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Mirror & BEST PACKING JOB EVER
reviews.reviewText: Love it. The mirror is really terrific. Even with a kickstand back it's a sturdy low profile & barely takes up any extra room. Totally distortion free & a clean modern look. Just a great value for the money.Even with the seller's disclaimer that it would arrive a week after Christmas, surprisingly it arrived a week BEFORE the Holiday.(Note: FYI, if you're gifting it, there IS an image of the mirror on the outside of the shipping box.)Packing was just as impressive as the mirror inside. When I saw the size of the flat shipping box, (and a couple of small shipping indentations in the face of cardboard box...I *hoped* I wouldn't find a cracked or damaged item inside. BIG CUDOS to the engineer who designed that packing box. He/she deserves a Medal. Safecased inside the heavy double cardboard outer box was a sturdy wooden shipping frame supporting the mirror inside. The mirror was then sandwiched between 2 layers of Styrofoam on both the front & back of it. The shipper could have launched that box off the Empire State Building w/o ANY damage.I can't imagine any way anyone could be disappointed with the mirror or the seller.5☆s all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very impressed with this mirror. It came boxed up very well. It is slightly flimsy, but if hanging or propped up, you wouldn’t notice it. Looks great in my home. It has a leg that pops out in the back to prop up instead of hanging. I would buy this again. Good quality for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Arrived perfectly packaged and intact. Great quality mirror for the price! It looks so good in my bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Came broken just my luck. The sent a second one with no problem it came fast and it wasn’t broken. Nice mirror just need better handling during delivery or more padding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am purchased two of these beautiful mirrors & chose the arched shape in black . Quality & price was perfect & shipping was fast. Packaged well. I highly suggest using this seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective for Home Gym Mirrors
reviews.reviewText: The Sweetcrispy 64"x21" Full Length Mirror with Stand has become a go-to choice for my home gym, and I've actually bought multiples. These mirrors are not only practical for checking form during workouts but also add a sleek touch to the gym space. The value they offer for their size and quality is impressive – you're getting a full-body mirror at a reasonable cost. One thing that pleasantly surprised me was their durability. I accidentally knocked one over, and to my relief, it didn't break. That's a testament to the sturdy construction and overall resilience of these mirrors. If you're in the market for affordable yet reliable full-length mirrors for your home gym, the Sweetcrispy mirrors with stands are a solid choice that adds functionality and style to your workout space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Mirror! Perfect & As Described! 👌🏼
reviews.reviewText: I love this mirror! 🩷 I wanted a full-size mirror for my bedroom but didn't want to take up door space by hanging one. I ordered this one and the first delivery showed up cracked at the top of the frame in a spiderweb like pattern. Also, the packing shows it was supposed to come in a wooden type box frame and this was not included with the mirror. The only protection it had was Styrofoam. 🤔😡🤷🏽‍♀️ I ordered a replacement and this one showed up in perfect condition 😍 (see photo). I would definitely recommend this mirror as it can either be hung or you can use the stand legs that are attached as I have done. However, given my first delivery experience you can choose for yourself; personally I feel the broken mirror was likely a result of poor delivery standards on the particular driver who dropped my package off (as, he originally delivered a package to me, told Amaon that it was delivered, and when I went outside to get it, the package was a carpet addressed to a woman 5 miles away🤷🏽‍♀️🤦🏽‍♀️).PS. Peep my dog sleeping in on my bed in the mirror for your daily dose of serotonin today 😍
